item.description: Image Processing # App # here you can play with different kernels options. You can generate your own kernels too. In order 1..9 the kernel is: Identity, Sharpen Roll the mouse to increase the size of the area, middle click button also toggles to full screen filtering Grab custom image Change filter size with scroll mouse and arrows Add Input for custom kernel, scroll changes its value. Image histogram Add lightness options Image Kernel Processing Histogram #

Motion Aftereffect (Waterfall Illusion) # Explanation # Fixate on the central cross during the motion and watch the cycle at least three times. Observe the motion aftereffect in the resting figure (the Buddha of Kamakura). [There is a more flashy version on the next page.] The “warping” caused by the motion aftereffect applies to anything you look at. You may also try to cover one eye, adapt over ≈3 cycles and then test with the other eye (for this, you will need to stop the movie at the right point…).
